questions.text: Which component is NOT part of a typical IIoT ecosystem?
What is the main purpose of a data analytics platform in IIoT?
options: To process and analyze data to derive insights
questions.correctAnswer: To process and analyze data to derive insights

questions.text: Which of these is a wireless communication technology?
What is a key consideration when choosing sensors for an IIoT application?
options: The accuracy, range, and power consumption of the sensor
The brand name of the sensor
questions.correctAnswer: The accuracy, range, and power consumption of the sensor

questions.text: What is scalability in the context of an IIoT platform?
options: The ability of the platform to handle a growing number of devices and data
The physical size of the platform
questions.correctAnswer: The ability of the platform to handle a growing number of devices and data
